original_text: Job was very upset and he sat down among some ashes. He used a piece of a broken pot to remove the bad bits of skin.
korean_text: 욥이 재 가운데 앉아서 질그릇 조각을 가져다가 몸을 긁고 있더니

sentences.original_text: and he sat down among some ashes
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 재 더미 속에 앉았습니다

to remove the bad bits of skin
